buduradun wishala mahanuwara kutagara shalawe wada wesena samaye maha prajapathi gothami dewiya rohini nadi thirayedi pawidi wu kumaruwange bharyawan 500 dena samanga kes sinda, kasawath handa kimbaulwath puraye sita pa gamaninma wishala mahanuwarata paminiyaya.ananda himiyange margayen kanthawanta sasun pawidda denalesa illa sitiyaha.ananda himi buduradunta me bawa salakalada unwahanse thewarakma ema illima prathikshepa kalaha.pasuwa ananda himige balawath uthsahaya matha karunu pahada di maha prajapathi gothamiya pradhana kanthawanta sasun dora wiwrutha wiya.pawidda awashyanam ashtagaru dharma piligatha yuthuya,eyama ayata pawidda ha upasampadawa wanneyi buduradun prakasha kalaha.eya piligena ewalehima pawidda ha upasampadawa labiya.

samanya janathawata wadi prayojanayak athi deyak neme ee kathawa.eekatath ekka menna me hedima balannako.tabukathandarakarayawaliyashep!me hedimen kiyawena kathandare menna mehemayi.onna langadi indala kathandara blog eke wadipura yanne chu kathandara, kakkussi kathandara, nana kamara kathandara wage samanyayen nokiyana katha.ape tabu sar sabayata aawe oya tabu katha nohoth samanyayen nokiyana katha kiyalane.

dawith saha diwasiwaraya wu samuwel da owunge nilawalata owun path kalo ya. 23 owhu da owunge puthrayo da gruha mandapaya wana samindanan wahansege maligawe doratu maruwen maruwata mura kalaha. 24 nagenahira da basnahira da uthura da dakuna da yana sathara pathiwala doratu palakayo sitiyo ya. 25 owunge gamwala siti owunge sahodarayo da sath dawasakata warak owun samanga maruwen maruwata aawo ya. 26 manda, ee lewiwarun wana pradhana doratu palakayan satharadena niyama nilayehi sita dewiyan wahansege maligawehi athulu gewal da gabadawal da balagathha. 27 dewiyan wahansege maligawa rakawal kirima owunge yuthukama wa thibunu nisa owhu ee maligawa watakara nawathi sitiyo ya.
atha powanne mewani pasubimak thulaya.
